name: Mall Crawl
description:
A simplified roguelike.

You are robbing a local mega store.  Collect any item of value and put them in the Van!

Controls: W, S, A, D - use these 4 keys to move, attack, and interact.

Details you don't need to read:

Every interact-able object has a level which is displayed right next to it.  You can increase your level permanently by consuming fried chicken or temporarily by wielding an item with level.  Every level after round 3 has at least 1 permanent buff item, so if you are having a hard time getting far consider farming up.

List of special objects:

Fried chicken - increase your level permanently by 1.

Soda bottle - increase your speed permanently by 1. If your speed is higher than 0 you will lose 1 speed each round.

Pickaxe - dig through any terrain or high level object.

Shovel - does not lose a level by hitting things. Attacking corpses will turn them to graves first.

Airhorn - decrease the level of every object in the map by 1. Also lowers scanner level.

Duct tape - increase the level of currently wielded item by 2.

Elevator - constantly spawns enemies.

Register - drops money when destroyed.
